TFGBV Support Chatbot

Confidential Support & Information

السلام علیکم / आदाब / Hello! I am here to provide you with confidential support and information about Technology-Facilitated Gender-Based Violence (TFGBV). You can ask me about: • What is TFGBV? • How to stay safe online • Where to report abuse • Your legal rights • Support services available How can I help you today?
